Package  Class   Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Uses of Package
com.craftar

Classes in com.craftar used by com.craftar
CraftARActivity
          Activities using the CraftARSDK must extend CraftARActivity instead of Activity.
CraftARCamera
          Used to manage functions related to the camera.
CraftARCameraView
          View where the SDK knows how to draw the camera capture and the AR contents.
CraftARCloudRecognition
          Module that interacts with the CRS service.
CraftARCloudRecognitionError
          Describes an error that happened while performing calls to the cloud
CraftARContentDownloadProgressHandler
          Interface used to receive feedback of the downloading progress of a CraftARTrackingContent3DModel.
CraftARImage
          Class that wraps a jpeg image using the optimal resolution and compression.
CraftARImageHandler
          Interface that receives the responses of the calls to CraftARCamera.takePicture()
CraftARItem
          Contains an item from a cloud search.
CraftARItemAR
          CraftARItem that handles an Augmented Reality experience.
CraftARItemFactory
          Parses the CraftARItem from a JSON object and detects if is an AR or IR item (Augmented Reality or Image Recognition only).
CraftARResponseHandler
          Interface to receive the responses from the CraftARCloudRecognition.
CraftARSDKException
          Manages internal exceptions occurred within the CraftAR SDK
CraftARTouchEventInterface.OnContentClickListener
          Interface that lets you define the behavior for click events on the Augmented Reality contents.
CraftARTouchEventInterface.OnTouchEventListener
          Interface that lets you define the behavior for touch events on the Augmented Reality contents.
CraftARTracking
          Module that manages the AR experience allowing to add AR items and contents and rendering the contents in the camera preview.
CraftARTrackingContent
          Abstract class for a content that can be drawn on top of a reference image for a CraftARItemAR.
CraftARTrackingContent3dmodel
          A 3d model content for a CraftARItemAR
CraftARTrackingContentFactory
          Creates a CraftARTrackingContent from a CRS response's content item in the JSON.
CRSConnect
          CRSConnect allows you to send requests to the CraftAR Recognition Server.
CRSConnectHandler
          Implemented by the CraftARCloudRecognition class to receive the network responses from the CRSConnect.
OnTrackingExpired
          Implement this interface if you want to override the behaviour when the free trial of 90 seconds expires.
